body:
### Problem

```
FAILED   ...unctional/ex_cmds/swapfile_preserve_recover_spec.lua @ 153: swapfile detection redrawing during prompt does not break treesitter
...unctional/ex_cmds/swapfile_preserve_recover_spec.lua:198: Row 3 did not match.
Expected:
  |{100:^vim.o.foldmethod} {100:=} {101:'expr'}                                                                           |
  |{100:vim.o.foldexpr} {100:=} {101:'v:lua.vim.treesitter.foldexpr()'}                                                  |
  |*{102:+--  3 lines: vim.defer_fn(function()·······························································}|
  |*{104:pcall}{100:(vim.cmd.edit,} {101:'Xtest_swapredraw.lua'}{100:)}                                                         |
  |*{105:~                                                                                                   }|
  |*{105:~                                                                                                   ...
                                                                                             }|
  |{105:~                                                                                                   }|
  |{106:Xtest_swapredraw.lua                                                              1,1            All}|
  |                                                                                                    |
Actual:
  |{100:^vim.o.foldmethod} {100:=} {101:'expr'}                                                                           |
  |{100:vim.o.foldexpr} {100:=} {101:'v:lua.vim.treesitter.foldexpr()'}                                                  |
  |*{100:vim.}{104:defer_fn}{100:(}{107:function}{100:()}                                                                             |
  |*  {100:vim.api.}{104:nvim__redraw}{100:(}{104:{} {108:valid} {100:=} {100:false} {104:}}{100:)}                                                           |
  |*{107:end}{100:,} {100:500)}                                                                                           |
  |*{104:pcall}{100:(vim.cmd.edit,} {101:'Xtest_swapredraw.lua'}{100:)}                                                         |
  |{105:~                                                                                                   
...
  |{105:~                                                                                                   }|
  |{105:~                                                                                                   }|
  |{106:Xtest_swapredraw.lua                                                              1,1            All}|
  |                       
```

### Expected behavior

x

title: unreliable test: swapfile_preserve_recover_spec, "swapfile detection redrawing during prompt"
